statements: SELECT * FROM bookstore_books
SELECT title, author FROM bookstore_books WHERE copies_available > 0
SELECT author, title FROM bookstore_books WHERE author LIKE 'J%'
SELECT * FROM bookstore_books ORDER BY copies_available DESC
SELECT book_id, title FROM bookstore_books WHERE copies_available < 5
SELECT * FROM bookstore_books WHERE book_id = 1
SELECT title, author FROM bookstore_books WHERE copies_available > 0 ORDER BY author ASC
SELECT * FROM bookstore_books WHERE title LIKE '%Harry Potter%' OR title LIKE '%Lord of the Rings%' ORDER BY title DESC
SELECT DISTINCT author FROM bookstore_books WHERE copies_available > 5
SELECT title, author, copies_available FROM bookstore_books WHERE author = 'J.K. Rowling' AND copies_available < 10
SELECT * FROM Books WHERE copies_available > 0;
SELECT title, author FROM Books WHERE author = 'JK Rowling';
SELECT title FROM Books WHERE author = 'Stephen King' ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT * FROM Books WHERE author LIKE 'J%';
SELECT title, copies_available FROM Books ORDER BY copies_available DESC;
SELECT * FROM Books WHERE copies_available > 0 ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT title, author, location FROM Books JOIN Bookstore ON title = store_name WHERE author = 'J.K. Rowling';
SELECT * FROM Bookstore WHERE location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY store_name DESC;
SELECT title, author, copies_available FROM Books WHERE author = 'George Orwell' AND copies_available >= 5;
SELECT store_id, store_name, COUNT(*) AS num_books FROM Bookstore JOIN Books ON store_name = title GROUP BY store_id, store_name HAVING count(*) > 3 ORDER BY num_books DESC;
SELECT * FROM books;
SELECT title, author FROM books WHERE num_copies > 10;
SELECT book_id, title FROM books WHERE author = 'J.K. Rowling';
SELECT * FROM authors ORDER BY nationality DESC;
SELECT title, num_available FROM books JOIN book_stock ON books.book_id = book_stock.book_id;
SELECT * FROM books WHERE num_copies > 0
SELECT title, author FROM books WHERE author LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY title DESC
SELECT b.title, b.author, bs.num_available FROM books b JOIN book_stock bs ON b.book_id = bs.book_id WHERE bs.num_available > 10
SELECT a.name, a.nationality, b.title FROM authors a JOIN books b ON a.author_id = b.author_id WHERE b.num_copies > 5 ORDER BY a.name
SELECT b.title, b.author, COALESCE(bs.num_available, 0) AS available_copies FROM books b LEFT JOIN book_stock bs ON b.book_id = bs.book_id ORDER BY available_copies DESC
SELECT * FROM Books;
SELECT book_title, author FROM Books WHERE genre='Mystery';
SELECT author_name, nationality FROM Authors WHERE birth_year > 1980 ORDER BY author_name ASC;
SELECT genre_id, genre_name FROM Genres;
SELECT book_title, copies_available FROM Books ORDER BY copies_available DESC;
SELECT * FROM Books WHERE copies_available > 0;
SELECT author, book_title FROM Books WHERE genre = 'Science Fiction';
SELECT book_id, author, genre FROM Books WHERE author = 'J.K. Rowling' ORDER BY genre;
SELECT b.book_title, a.author_name, g.genre_name FROM Books b JOIN Authors a ON b.author = a.author_name JOIN Genres g ON b.genre = g.genre_name;
SELECT author_name, nationality, COUNT(*) AS total_books FROM Authors JOIN Books ON Authors.author_name = Books.author GROUP BY author_name, nationality ORDER BY total_books DESC;
SELECT * FROM books;
SELECT title, author FROM books WHERE published_year > 2000;
SELECT author, published_year FROM books ORDER BY published_year DESC;
SELECT book_id, title, published_year FROM books WHERE author = 'J.K. Rowling';
SELECT title, author, num_copies FROM books WHERE num_copies < 10;
SELECT * FROM books WHERE author='J.K. Rowling';
SELECT title, author, published_year FROM books ORDER BY published_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM authors WHERE num_books_published > 5 AND birth_year < 1970;
SELECT book_id, title, num_copies FROM books WHERE num_copies < 10 ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT b.title, a.author_name, br.rating FROM books b JOIN authors a ON b.author = a.author_name JOIN book_ratings br ON b.book_id = br.book_id WHERE br.rating > 4.5;
